text: Matthijs Büchli (born 13 December 1992) is a Dutch track cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Track Team . He became world champion in the keirin at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships. In 2016 Büchli won the silver medal in the Men's Keirin at the Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, despite of experiencing a severe knee injury only 5 month before the Olympic Games. Since 2017 Büchli is riding for the commercial team of together with Theo Bos and Roy van den Berg. ==Major results== ;2011 : National Track Championships ::2nd Kilo ::2nd Omnium ::3rd Keirin ;2012 : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Sprint ::3rd Keirin ;2013 : 1st Keirin, 2012–13 UCI Track Cycling World Cup, Aguascalientes : 3rd Keirin, UCI Track Cycling World Championships ;2014 : 3rd Keirin, UCI Track Cycling World Championships ;2016 : 2nd Keirin, Summer Olympics : 2nd Team sprint, UCI Track Cycling World Championships ;2017 : 2nd Team sprint, UCI Track Cycling World Championships : 3rd Team sprint, UEC European Track Championships ;2018 : 1st 20px Team sprint, UCI Track Cycling World Championships : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Sprint ::3rd Team sprint ;2019 : UCI Track Cycling World Championships ::1st 20px Team sprint ::1st 20px Keirin ==Further information== * "Double delight for GB cyclists.(Sport)."
